name: Dyson Airwrap
details:

For Hannah’s long, beautiful hair. No heat damage, just effortless curls every morning. 專為Hannah嘅長髮設計！每日醒來都係女神頭，無損傷造型

name: Le Creuset Cast Iron Pot (26cm)
details:
Le Creuset Signature Round Dutch Oven – Cerise Red

Our first pot for family dinners, soups, and Sunday roasts. Will last a lifetime, just like our love. 紅色代表愛情！呢個煲會陪我哋煮第一餐、第一百餐、第一千餐

name: Red Pocket 利是 (Any amount)
details:
隨心利是 ♡ 任何金額都好感動！

Your love and blessings mean the world to us. Every dollar helps build our future home. 錢多錢少都係心意！每一分都係你哋對我哋嘅愛
